definition: up and down/top and bottom/old and new/length/about
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
the entire nation/the whole country, from the leadership to the rank and file
to raise and lower one's hand (idiom); to signal as conspiratorial hint/fig. conspiring to defraud
popular history of China in three volumes by Cao Yuzhang 曹余章
lit. knives rain down from the sky (idiom)/fig. (even if) the sky crumbles

sentences.english: Now you need to explicitly run the action from the context menu.
sentences.chinese: 现在你需要在上下文菜单里明确地执行这一指令。

sentences.english: For anybody who bounces, their tremolo will be a problem.
sentences.chinese: 如果谁的右手上下跳动，那么他的轮指一定有问题。

sentences.english: You swipe up and down to scroll lists of, say, tracks or artists.
sentences.chinese: 你可以上下滑动来滚动列表，比如，艺术家列表。

sentences.english: This first volume reveals the crucial initial steps for getting a short film off the ground.
sentences.chinese: 这是首卷，展现了一个上下车短片关键的第一步。

sentences.english: The locks prevent its downward and upward movement at the same time stimulating energy.
sentences.chinese: 收束在阻塞了能量上下运动的同时，也刺激着能量。
它与上下文无关，并且毫不含糊。

sentences.english: If you work in a factory, you usually have to punch a clock.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在工厂工作，你就要在上下班记时卡上打孔。

sentences.english: The Patriots totally misconstrued this passage and ignored its context.
sentences.chinese: 完全曲解这段经文并忽略其上下文。

sentences.english: As it turned out, we didn't need context-sensitive help.
sentences.chinese: 结果证明我们不需要上下文相关的帮助。

sentences.english: Until you have the expertise, don't bet on an inside straight.
sentences.chinese: 在你拥有这项专长前，不要在扑克中的顺子上下赌注。

sentences.english: Stretch your toes up and down several times.
sentences.chinese: 多次上下舒展你的脚趾。

sentences.english: The hammer and sickle was flying over the roof.
sentences.chinese: 镰刀斧头旗在屋顶上下空飘扬。

sentences.english: The context should not include the solution or any technical jargon.
sentences.chinese: 上下文不应包括解决方案或任何技术行话。

sentences.english: It slides up and down my heel when I walk around.
sentences.chinese: 当我走动时，它就在我脚跟上下滑动。

sentences.english: Kirstie has been up and down the scale many times, and right now she is on an upswing.
sentences.chinese: 柯斯迪的体重一直上下波动，现在体重有上升趋势。

sentences.english: The day is celebrated as Teachers Day in the country with great enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 教师节这一天，全国上下都以极大的热情来庆祝。

definition: around/from beginning to end/all around/front and rear
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to make a round trip/return journey/back and forth/to and fro/repeatedly
in general/more or less/in rough terms/basically/on the whole/overall situation/the big picture/(Tw) remains (of a dead person)
